title: Wilderness Lodge Escape on New Zealand’s North Island
description: Experience the ultimate nature lover’s escape with alpine-style tranquility year-round on New Zealand’s North Island at Powderhorn Chateau. Located at the base of Tongariro National Park, this lodge is ideally placed for exploring this stunning UNESCO World Heritage Site, which includes several locations featured in ‘The Lord of the Rings’ films. Complete your stay with daily à la carte breakfast, a bottle of wine on arrival, food and drink credit and a late checkout.
offer_address: (Bottom Of Mountain Road, Ohakune) 194 Mangawhero Terrace, Ohakune 4625, New Zealand

title: Alpine-Style Chateau Retreat on New Zealand’s North Island with Daily Breakfast & NZ$50 Dining Credit
description:
Experience the ultimate nature lover’s escape during a well-deserved stay at Powderhorn Chateau - an alpine-style lodge in the heart of New Zealand’s North Island. Located at the base of Tongariro National Park, this estate is a quiet refuge that’s perfectly placed for discovering this UNESCO World Heritage-listed site, which includes several locations featured in ‘The Lord of the Rings’ film trilogy.

You'll love every detail of this peaceful, friendly alpine lodge, including its sprawling grounds, manicured gardens, and fabulous amenities. Shared facilities include an indoor heated swimming pool, darts, board games and pool tables, with spectacular native bushwalks and outdoor activities on your doorstep.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Prepare for a day of indulgence with daily gourmet à la carte breakfast
- Make the most of NZ$50 dining credit per package to spend at the onsite restaurants and bar
- Toast your escape with a welcome bottle of wine on arrival
- Enjoy a well-deserved sleep-in with a guaranteed 1pm late checkout

**Longer stay bonus**: Stay three nights or more and enjoy NZ$100 credit per package (instead of NZ$50) towards food and drinks.
offer_address: (Bottom Of Mountain Road, Ohakune) 194 Mangawhero Terrace, Ohakune 4625, New Zealand

title: Lodge Escape with the Famous Tongariro National Park at Your Doorstep
description: Experience the ultimate nature lover’s escape with two, three or four nights of alpine-style tranquility on New Zealand’s North Island at the boutique Powderhorn Chateau. Reconnect with nature and enjoy daily à la carte breakfast, bottle of wine on arrival, a NZ$50 food and beverage credit, complimentary Wi-Fi and a late 1pm checkout to make the most of your final day.
